subject: Re: Urgent Fix: [Design Tiles Sydney]: New order #93550

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Jacqueline,

Confirming we have updated the live site.

Yes please go ahead.
Thank you

Yes thank you Joel





Please leave us a review here

Hi Jacqueline,

Sure, are you ok to have a minimum total weight of 1kg for the cart samples.

Please see below:
If 1 item sample is on the cart, the weight will be 1kg.
If 2 item samples is on the cart, the weight will be 1kg.
If 3 item samples is on the cart, the weight will be 1.2kg.
If 4 item samples is on the cart, the weight will be 1.6kg.
If 5 item samples is on the cart, the weight will be 2kg.

If the customer has order 5 samples - its approx 2 kilos
But if they order 1-2 samples then its just 1kg approx

So it just depends what the customer orders.

Hi Jacqueline,

We have now set the weight to be .4kg per sample tiles. If you have 5 sample on your cart you will have total of 2kg.

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi Joel,

Is this 2kg for the whole sample box weight?

Hi Jacqueline,

Thanks for that, We will set the default sample weight to 2kg.

Let us know if this works for you and we will push this to the live site?

Hi Joel,

Samples are normally 1-2kg in total weight.





Please leave us a review here

Hi Jacqueline,

We have making changes to the staging to test the premium version of "Advanced Product Sample for WooCommerce (Premium)".

The premium plugin is now able to work properly and with a little bit customization, the "Australia Post Shipping Parcel" is now showing up. In order to calculate the amount of "Australia Post Shipping Parcel" we need to set a weight for each product (This would be time consuming as the site has a lot of products). So we created a script that runs in the background, and all we need is "global default weight for sample tiles", this will act as a fall back if the sample weight field is empty and will be sent to "Australia Post Shipping Parcel".

Would you be able to send us the weight of the sample tiles? (That will act as a default weight sample tiles)

Here is a link for you to check. You can use the same account
https://stg-designtiles-stg.kinsta.cloud/product/majesty-palm-feature-wall-tile-600x1200mm/

@joel here is the plugin and here is the licence key: sk_0pwE~2reh!u5z343*I.3q~vsrktBh

Can you please take it from here.

Hi Heath
Please go ahead and purchase and charge us
Thank you




Please leave us a review Here

Hi Jacqueline,

Sure, would you like to purchase the plugin and send to me, or do you want us to purchase and on charge to you?

Hi Heath
Thank you so much for the informative video. Can we please go ahead with this plug in

Thank you




Please leave us a review Here

Hi Jacqueline,

We have been looking into this and found the issue. It's to do with the Australia Post Shipping limits and how this has been setup in the website. Please watch this video where I explain the problem and the potential fix: https://www.loom.com/share/f093bb685aed4604b57067bd717113e8?sid=22154f6a-b595-471f-aa42-b9ff6a2b1d01

This is a link to the licence we will need: https://www.thedotstore.com/product-sample-woocommerce/

Let me know if you have any questions?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

All our orders are coming through as store pick up even though customers are trying to enter delivery. Please see email attached example

Can you please fix this asap
